raw_comment: The graph shows that you are more likely to get admitted into an elite college, disregarding income, if you are a legacy applicant. But the higher your income, the higher chance you have of being admitted, regardless if you're a legacy applicant or not.
ace_sentences: The graph shows a relation between admission to an elite college and legacy status.
A legacy applicant is more likely to be admitted to an elite college than a non-legacy applicant.
This is true regardless of income.
The graph also shows a relation between admission to an elite college and income.
If a person's income is higher then the person's chance of admission is higher.
This is true for a legacy applicant and for a non-legacy applicant.
